svg.text: PROMPTLOCK, R&D EXFILTRATION AND DOUBLE EXTORTION

g.text: • 5 days of silent exfiltration (D+1 to D+5)
• HTTPS channel hidden in legitimate API traffic
• Theft of patents, clinical trials and formulations
• Driven by a local LLM (Ollama) in Go
• Deployment via forged Kerberos and GPO
• Axis 2: Threat of publishing exfiltrated IP
DEFENSE IN DEPTH MODEL AGAINST AGENTIC KILL CHAIN
No isolated layer is enough: the combination of all 5 controls interrupts the agent's progression.
Thirteen tactics covered in total across the entire AI agentic Kill Chain.
AI serves as a force multiplier: it doesn't invent new weapons, but gives the attacker speed and
adaptability (ransomware syntactic variability, accelerated lateralization) which radically compress manual
detection windows. Fundamental security hygiene remains the most cost-effective defensive weapon.
OpenClaw Killchain Analysis — F. Pizzi — Univ. Paris Sorbonne, 2026 — Infographic v5.0 Final
Entirely fictional scenario — No real attack conducted
